## ggplot2

```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(results = "hold", fig.retina = 2)
set.seed(1830)
```

## 範例

```{r}
mtcars <- read.table("mtcars.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
dim(mtcars)
str(mtcars)
```

```{r a}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) + geom_point() +
    labs(title = "automobile data", x = "weight", y = "miles per gallon")
```
